item.description:
ULTIMATE SUNDAY NITE DANCE PARTY SUNDAY May 31 @ 7 pm at Ultimate Billiards Night Club 151 Webster Square Road, Berlin, CT, 06037

Ultimate Billiards is a huge Night Club with a 600-person capacity – it has a Stage, Dance Floor, 25 Pool Tables, Ping Pong, Darts, Air Hockey -Central CT Singles Party guests play for FREE!

This is a more casual event of Dancing, Pool, Games and New Friends

Join Central CT Singles And Hundreds Of Local Singles and Dance The Night Away

–Meet Someone Special And Party With Central CT Singles

“Singles Dances provide the opportunity to meet many local singles all in one place
So if you dance, don't dance, or just want to party with other local singles and meet someone special,
and check out the next Central CT Singles Dance Party”

* Appetizers *
* DJ Dance Music and Requests*
* Plenty of FREE Safe Parking *
* FREE Pool *
* FREE Ping Pong *
* FREE Darts *
* FREE Air Hockey *
* Drink Specials *

ULTIMATE BILLIARDS
151 Webster Square Road
Berlin, CT, 06037
(Directly off the Berlin Turnpike, Across from Berlin Showcase Cinemas)

CLICK HERE FOR DIRECTIONS

Or visit http://maps.google.co... Webster Square Road, Berlin, CT, 06037

SAVE MONEY - Tickets are only $10
ONLINE SPECIAL - 2 Tickets for $15 only at http://www.CentralCTS...

Group Special - Half Price Tickets For Groups Of 10 or More
(only $ 5 per ticket) and Reserved Table(s) for your Group

CELEBRATE YOUR BIRTHDAY WITH CENTRAL CT SINGLES -AND GET FREE ADMISSION AND FREE CHAMPANGE !

Check Out Our Ads In The Hartford Courant And The Hartford Advocate

Visit www.CentralCTSingles.com for more info or call (860) 236-3343

SEE YOU AT THE PARTY!
item.how_to_find_us: Follow the Central CT Singles Signs

group.name: CTMatch Singles Events Music Dance Speed Dating Golf Comedy

item.name: ULTIMATE SUNDAY NITE DANCE PARTY SUNDAY May 31 @ 7 pm at Ultimate Billiards
